name: Dumbbell Floor Skullcrushers
cues: Lie on your back on the floor, holding a dumbbell in each hand above your chest
Lower the dumbbells toward your ears, keeping elbows fixed and upper arms perpendicular to the floor
Extend your elbows to raise the weights back to the starting position
Keep your elbows from flaring out
variations: Use a bench for greater range of motion
